The claim stated that the FCC raided CNN: s head offices, but the expert's verdict clarified that such raids did not take place.
The expert: s verdict also mentioned that the source of the claim, Your News Wire, is a clickbait-driven fake news site, which further discredits the authenticity of the claim.
The FCC: s regulatory authority is limited to over-the-air broadcasters, and they can only impose fines or revoke/deny licenses, not conduct law enforcement-style raids.
